smart_goals.description: Increase daily water intake to 2000ml by drinking at least 3 bottles of water (500ml each) per day before 6 PM starting from Monday.

Reduce daily sugar intake to 50g by avoiding sugary beverages and desserts and replacing them with fresh fruits or vegetables. Monitor and record daily intake using a food journal starting from next Tuesday.

Engage in 30 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity five times per week, including brisk walking, cycling, or swimming. Record and log activities using a fitness tracker or smartphone app beginning next Wednesday.
Improve medication adherence by taking prescribed medications as directed every day, keeping a medication log, and setting reminders using a smartphone app starting from Thursday.
Monitor and record blood glucose levels before each meal and after dinner using a glucometer, aiming for pre-meal levels below 130mg/dL and post-meal levels below 180mg/dL starting from Friday.
